user_requirements: Aplikace poskytne admin FE prostředí pro správa dotazníků business uživatelem/vlastníkem. Vytvoření nové šablony dotazníku, struktura ze známých elementů, bez dopadů do algoritmu vyhodnocení, typologie dotazníku, activace/deaktivace, preview funkce, kopírování šablon, export šablon, editace dotazníku, nová verze šablony, uživatelský changelog, porovnání verzí, smazání verzí pouze skrze deaktivaci, přístup přes role a AD integraci, funkční moduly pro obsluhu klientů a správu dotazníků, audit.
user_instructions: dont not forget on IT operations part

epic_requirements.A: Admin frontend environment provision for questionnaire management by business users/owners with comprehensive administrative capabilities
epic_requirements.B: New questionnaire template creation functionality with structured elements and defined typologies without algorithm evaluation impacts
epic_requirements.C: Template lifecycle management including activation/deactivation, preview functions, template copying, and export capabilities
epic_requirements.D: Questionnaire editing capabilities with version control, user changelog tracking, and version comparison functionality
epic_requirements.E: Version management with deactivation-only deletion policy to maintain audit trails and data integrity
epic_requirements.F: Role-based access control integration with Active Directory authentication and authorization mechanisms
epic_requirements.G: Functional modules development for client service operations and comprehensive questionnaire administration
epic_requirements.H: Complete audit functionality for tracking all questionnaire management activities and changes
epic_requirements.I: IT operations integration including system maintenance, monitoring, and operational support capabilities
